info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 9:49PM CDT until May 01 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL BROWN AND COLEMAN COUNTIES... At 949 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mozelle, or near Voss, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Santa Anna around 1010 PM CDT. Grosvenor, Lake Brownwood Near Thrifty and Lake Brownwood around 1030 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mozelle, Whon, Fisk, Thrifty, Echo and Shields. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
